casebody.data:
2002-1873 (La. 10/14/02)

Charles M. ATWOOD, et al. v. GRAND CASINOS OF LOUISIANA, INC.-COUSHATTA No. 2002-C-1873. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Grand Casinos of LA Inc.-Coushatta; Jones, Mike; Beale, Lawrence Robert; — Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Allen, 33th Judicial District Court Div. 0, No. C-97-756; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, No. 01-1425.

Denied.
